Type.Name: PackType

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PackType extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Represents the packing location of children. (See: , , and ).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.PackType End = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The child is packed into the end of the box

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.PackType Start = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The child is packed into the start of the box.
